query: Generate a Meta ad campaign for a cloud-based project management software targeting business owners and managers aged 35-60 who are interested in productivity tools
campaign_name: Cloud Project Management Software Sales Campaign
target_audience: Targeting business owners and managers aged 35-60 aligns with the typical demographic that utilizes project management tools, ensuring relevance and engagement.

api_notes.placeholder_requirements: All placeholders must be replaced with valid IDs before API submission
api_notes.id_validation: Ensure all referenced IDs (interests, page, ad creative) exist and are accessible
creation_order: 4. Create ad using ad_set_id and creative_id
